thread.title: A Tiny Detailed Replica of Jerry Seinfeld’s Apartment
thread.title_full: A Tiny Detailed Replica of Jerry Seinfeld’s Apartment

author: Justin Page
title: A Tiny Detailed Replica of Jerry Seinfeld’s Apartment
text:
Artist Alan Wolfson worked with the original production designer of Seinfeld , Thomas Azzari , to create a tiny and highly detailed replica of Jerry Seinfeld ‘s iconic apartment . They are available to pre-order from the Seinfeld Set Replica website and scheduled to ship in June 2017. 


images via Seinfeld Set Replica 
via io9 
Related Laughing Squid Posts Hand-Drawn Floor Plans of Popular TV Show Apartments and Houses Jerry Seinfeld’s Apartment Recreated in Doom II ‘Jerry’s Place’, A Recreation of Jerry’s Apartment From ‘Seinfeld’ for the Oculus Rift Virtual Reality Headset
